short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to watch Crunchyroll in Picture in Picture mode. Enables a separate floating window to enjoy your favorite video content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you looking for a tool to watch Crunchyroll in a convenient always-on-top window? 🖥️ You're in the right place! 😍 Focus on other tasks while watching your favorite series.

Crunchyroll Picture in Picture is perfect for multitasking 📑, having something on in the background 🎶, or even working from home 🏠 (we don’t advise sharing it with your boss though 😜).

There's no need to stack multiple browser tabs anymore or to use other screens; this extension has you covered 🚀.

How does it work? 🧐
Crunchyroll Picture in Picture allows you to play video content in a floating window 🪟 pinned always on top, so you can use the rest of your screen for other tasks.

This extension adds an extra control button 🔘, which can be found among other viewing options (e.g. full-screen). Just click on it to launch a separate window with the show you'd like to watch and place it wherever you want, whether you're browsing your FB feed 📱 or preparing a business presentation 💼.

All you need to do is add the Crunchyroll Picture in Picture extension to your browser and enjoy your favorite series in the background 🍿. It's as simple as that! 🎊

❗Please note: Due to the way Crunchyroll integrates subtitles into its content, displaying them in a separate or smaller window, such as in Picture-in-Picture (PiP) mode, is currently not possible. This limitation is tied to how the site handles subtitles and is not a restriction of our extension. We are committed to implementing this feature if technical limitations change in the future.❗
